content:
If there are four or more humans in the path discard, go to 204.9. Otherwise, continue reading.

Etra looks over the handful of villagers you've assembled and counts heads. "Hmm…could you maybe gather a few more people? Elder Orlin will surely need a greater consensus than this."

A) Continue helping Etra.

Discard all   from Etra.

B) Part ways.

Discard Etra and return HELPING HAND to the collection. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
